title: PartyIdentifier
description: Comprises an identifier and a source. The associated metadata key denotes the ability to associate a hash value to the PartyIdentifier instantiations for the purpose of model cross-referencing, in support of functionality such as the event effect and the lineage.

identifier.description: Provides an identifier associated with a party. The identifier is unique within the public source specified in the source attribute.

identifierType.description: Defines the source of the identifier.
